title: Merikh's Daughter
description: When Alexandra Frank agrees to spend the weekend with her best friend and her family at the beach, she has no idea that the world that she has known until that point will fall apart. Now finding herself in the midst of a supernatural world unknown to her, she comes face to face with Merikh and his ancient army who have been patiently preparing to obliterate the human race.
author: Gabriela M. Sanchez
